name: Lampent
description: This Pokémon appears just before someone passes away, so it’s feared as an emissary of death.

abilities.name: Top Entry
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if you drew this Pokémon from your deck at the beginning of your turn and your Bench isn’t full, before you put it into your hand, you may put it onto your Bench.

attacks.name: Reignite
attacks.effect: Attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Pokémon.
